data.text: New type of ultraviolet light makes indoor air as safe as outdoors: Using far-UVC light in places where people gather indoors could help prevent the next pandemic https://t.co/hQFemrDysf

urls.title: New type of ultraviolet light makes indoor air as safe as outdoors: Using far-UVC light in places where people gather indoors could help prevent the next pandemic
urls.description: A new type of ultraviolet light that is safe for people destroyed more than 98 percent of airborne microbes in a room within five minutes, a study found.

users.description: (once upon a time) New York Times technology reporter; Stewart Brand biographer; Writer-in-Residence Stanford Institute for Human Centered AI
users.name: John Markoff
